units.title: Lentiviral transduction of hiPSCs at day 15
units.text: hiPSCs were transduced with a lentiviral vector encoding FLP under the control of the CDH1 promoter at day 15 before analysis at day 24.
units.rationale: Specifies the timing and vector used to introduce FLP for lineage tracing.

units.title: 4‑OHT labeling at JCF stage
units.text: 4‑hydroxytamoxifen (4‑OHT) was applied at the beginning of the JCF stage (days 7–8; Fig. 4e and Extended Data Fig. 8a).
units.rationale: Describes the induction of Cre/FLP activity to label cells at a specific developmental window.

units.title: Detection of HA‑tag+CDH1+ cells after 72 h
units.text: After 72 h, we detected HA‑tag+CDH1+ cells, indicating correct labeling of the mesothelial layer (Extended Data Fig. 9b).
units.rationale: Provides a verification step confirming successful labeling.

units.title: Generation of FLP/FRT reporter hiPSC line
units.text: a flippase (FLP) recognition target (FRT)‑flanked neomycin cassette (mKate2) fused to a hemagglutinin (HA) tag was knocked into the AAVS1 safe harbor locus.
units.rationale: Creates a genetically engineered hiPSC line for inducible lineage tracing.

units.title: Immunostaining for cTnT and FN1
units.text: Immunostaining for cTnT and FN1 in control and Noonan syndrome organoids (day 15).
units.rationale: Detects cardiomyocyte and fibrotic markers to assess phenotype.

units.title: Calcium imaging in ET1‑treated epicardioid slices
units.text: Calcium imaging in ET1‑treated epicardioid slices.
units.rationale: Measures functional calcium dynamics after hypertrophic stimulus.

units.title: CellRank inference of terminal macrostates
units.text: CellRank was used to infer the terminal macrostates (myocytic, epicardial, endothelial and endodermal) and the probability of each cell to transition toward these states.
units.rationale: Analyzes cell fate trajectories from multi‑omic data.

units.title: Subclustering of epicardial lineage at day 15
units.text: We performed subclustering of the epicardial lineage at day 15 (differentially expressed genes (DEGs) listed in Supplementary Table 6).
units.rationale: Refines cell type resolution for downstream analysis.

units.title: qPCR analysis of hypertrophy markers relative to GAPDH
units.text: NPPA NPPB ACTA1 MYH7/MYH6 ... relative to GAPDH mRNA expression
units.rationale: Quantifies expression of hypertrophic genes normalized to a housekeeping gene.

units.title: Treatment of epicardioids with endothelin‑1 (ET1)
units.text: ET1‑treated epicardioids; control, n = 130 and ET1, n = 106 transients per layer.
units.rationale: Applies a vasoconstrictor to induce stress‑induced hypertrophy.
